metadata.synopsis: Gruff duergar guard standing watch ovre the entrance to Ketheric City.
metadata.how_to_trigger: To trigger Greetings (HasMet)1. Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. Use bebug book > Location > Act 1 > UND > Duergar Camp4. Finish first dialog.5, Talk to Cleric Morghal.To trigger Nere Killed1. Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. Use bebug book > Location > Act 1 > UND > Duergar Camp4. Finish first dialog.5, Use Recon command: "SetGlobalOsirisFlag UND_TheDrowNere_State_Dead"6. Talk with Cleric MorghalTo trigger Mutiny happened1. Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. Use bebug book > Location > Act 1 > UND > Duergar Camp4. Finish first dialog.5, Use Recon command: "SetGlobalOsirisFlag UND_DuergarCamp_State_Mutiny"6. Talk with Cleric MorghalTo trigger Greeting (Deepgnome tag)1. Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. Use bebug book > Location > Act 1 > UND > Duergar Camp4. Finish first dialog.5, Use Recon command: "addTag DEEPGNOME:2bbc3217-3d8c-46e6-b599-a0f1c9063f9a"6. Talk with Cleric Morghal.

3.speaker: Morghal
3.text: Get moving, or I'll move you.

4.speaker: Morghal
4.text: You got grit, I'll give you that much.
